arktsVersion_1_1.messageText: Object literals cannot be used as type declarations (arkts-no-obj-literals-as-types)
Use "class" instead of a type with constructor signature (arkts-no-ctor-signatures-type)
Use arrow functions instead of function expressions (arkts-no-func-expressions)
Using "this" inside stand-alone functions is not supported (arkts-no-standalone-this)
Using "this" inside stand-alone functions is not supported (arkts-no-standalone-this)
Use arrow functions instead of function expressions (arkts-no-func-expressions)
Using "this" inside stand-alone functions is not supported (arkts-no-standalone-this)
Using "this" inside stand-alone functions is not supported (arkts-no-standalone-this)
